org.apache.giraph.rexster.conf
Interface GiraphRexsterConstants

public interface GiraphRexsterConstants

Constants used all over Giraph for configuration specific for Rexster REST API.

Field Summary
static org.apache.giraph.conf.IntConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_E_ESTIMATE
          Rexster number of estimated edges in the graph to be loaded.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_GRAPH
          Rexster graph.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_GREMLIN_E_SCRIPT
          If the database is Gremlin enabled, the script will be used to retrieve the edges from the Rexster exposed database.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_GREMLIN_V_SCRIPT
          If the database is Gremlin enabled, the script will be used to retrieve the vertices from the Rexster exposed database.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_HOSTNAME
          Rexster hostname which provides the REST API.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_PASSWORD
          Rexster password to access the REST API.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.IntConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_PORT
          Rexster port where to contact the REST API.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_USERNAME
          Rexster username to access the REST API.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.BooleanConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_USES_SSL
          Rexster flag to set the connection over SSL instaed of clear-text.
static org.apache.giraph.conf.IntConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_V_ESTIMATE
          Rexster number of estimated vertices in the graph to be loaded.

Rexster flag to set the connection over SSL instaed of clear-text.

Rexster number of estimated edges in the graph to be loaded.

GIRAPH_REXSTER_GREMLIN_V_SCRIPT

static final org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_GREMLIN_V_SCRIPT
If the database is Gremlin enabled, the script will be used to retrieve the vertices from the Rexster exposed database.

GIRAPH_REXSTER_GREMLIN_E_SCRIPT

static final org.apache.giraph.conf.StrConfOption GIRAPH_REXSTER_GREMLIN_E_SCRIPT
If the database is Gremlin enabled, the script will be used to retrieve the edges from the Rexster exposed database.
